name: Line_DisruptionByMode
description: Get disruptions for all lines of the given modes.

modes.description: A comma-separated list of modes e.g. tube,dlr

$block: Represents a disruption to a route within the transport network.

$ul: **additionalInfo**: Gets or sets the additionaInfo of this disruption.
**affectedRoutes**: Gets or sets the routes affected by this disruption
**affectedStops**: Gets or sets the stops affected by this disruption
**category**: Gets or sets the category of this dispruption.
**categoryDescription**: Gets or sets the description of the category.
**created**: Gets or sets the date/time when this disruption was created.
**description**: Gets or sets the description of this disruption.
**lastUpdate**: Gets or sets the date/time when this disruption was last updated.
**summary**: Gets or sets the summary of this disruption.
**type**: Gets or sets the disruption type of this dispruption.
